summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 4639 lux), and cloud levels (up 564 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1494 m), light levels (up 6935 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 563.8m lower than yesterday, 1059.5m lower than past week, 1493.7m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 860m and a high of 3110m, averaging 1309.6m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and a mix of sun and clouds. Changeable conditions.
